title: The covetous mother, or, The terrible overthrow of two loyal lovers. You that these woeful tydings hear, surely your heart may bleed; who can forbear to shed a tear, when they these lines shall read? Tune of O so ungrateful a creature. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltspur-street, without Newgate,
